reviews.author: Jesse Fenton
reviews.review: Been here for over 5 years. The first 4 were fine but this last year with this new property manager has been a nightmare. All my maintenance requests are ignored even after the apartment above mine flooded their bathroom 4 times and refuse

reviews.author: Laura Sweet Mouse Rawes
reviews.review: I live here they accept Section 8, low income which is really hard to find in Bellingham

reviews.author: Denise Mercer
reviews.review: I used to live here. I would love to move back. It was a very nice place to live then. Approx 12 yrs ago.

reviews.author: Kevyn Jacobs
reviews.review: I have lived here for almost 10 years. It's affordable clean and safe housing in downtown Bellingham.

reviews.author: Rising Horizon Gaming
reviews.review: Living here has been the best thing that has happened to me. This place really saved my life
